column2: This is a must see area in LA
column3: Just outside LA’s Union Station on the way up the rise to Olvera Street in the old Pueblo is Placita de Dolores. The area is a cultural experience and very safe. The history of LA’s origin is found here.

We visited the Placita de Dolores when we were at the Olvera Street area, as it's very close by - part of the Spanish colonial history of Los Angeles. It's a nice green space area with the monument in the center. Ses to walk over from Union Station, which is what we did. Take the Metro to downtown LA. Enjoy. ...
